import React from "react" import { Responsive } from "../Utils/Responsive" import { Flex } from "../Elements/Flex" import { Image } from "../Elements/Image" import { Serif } from "@artsy/palette" import styled from "styled-components" import { themeGet } from "styled-system" import TextLink from "../../Components/TextLink" import { Box } from "../Elements/Box" const ScaledArtworkImage = props => ( ) export interface AuctionResultItemProps { imageUrl: string title: string date: string dimensions: string organization: string auctionDate: string salePrice?: string estimate: string description: string } export class AuctionResultItem extends React.Component { render() { return ( {({ xs, sm }) => { if (xs) return else if (sm) return return }} ) } } export const ExtraSmallAuctionResultItem = (props: AuctionResultItemProps) => { return (
{props.title}, {props.date} {props.dimensions} {props.organization} {props.auctionDate} View Details {props.salePrice && ( {`Sale: ${props.salePrice}`} )} Est: {props.estimate}
) } export const SmallAuctionResultItem = (props: AuctionResultItemProps) => { return (
{props.title}, {props.date} {props.dimensions} {props.organization} {props.auctionDate} View Details
{props.salePrice && ( {`Sale: ${props.salePrice}`} )} Est: {props.estimate}
) } export const LargeAuctionResultItem = (props: AuctionResultItemProps) => { return (
{props.title}, {props.date} {props.dimensions} {props.description}
{props.organization} {props.auctionDate} Full Description
{props.salePrice && ( {`Sale: ${props.salePrice}`} )} Est: {props.estimate}
) } const MetadataContainer = styled.div` color: ${themeGet("colors.black60")}; ` const Title = styled.span` font-style: italic; `
